alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 23 at 3:58PM AKST until November 24 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Haines Hwy near Haines Customs and Klondike Hwy above 2500 ft. * WHEN...From 9 AM Wednesday to 6 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow has started on the Haines and Klondike Highways with accumulations of around 1 to 3 inches as of 3 pm Wednesday. The cities of Haines and Skagway have been too warm for snow so far. However, Haines has cooled down to the mid 30s so far and may see a change over to snow sometime this evening with a few inches of accumulation possible if temperatures continue to cool.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
